through the remaining stitch on needle to bind off weave in the ends you can block the scarf to create neater ends *** for adjustments to make a wider scarf you can cast on more stitches the way this pattern was written was to hopefully provide very straightforward instructions but if you want a wider scarf here are some more concise instructions to form the starting point to form the ending point you start off by knitting 1 stitch and letting the remaining again making sure that the starting point is on the left side cast on stitches rest on your needle before working the of your working yarn stitch back work the seed stitch pattern until 2 stitches remain k2 every other row the odd numbered row you knit an together additional stitch from your cast on stitches if you can see in the pattern
